channel.title: Still need text help [PI]

item.title: Still need text help [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Acrodox Acrodox
item.description:
@Acrodox wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Declare this, in PlayerAssistant class;

public void clearQuestInterface() {
    for (int element : QuestInterface) {
        getPA().sendFrame126("", element);
    }
}

public int[] QuestInterface = {8145, 8147, 8148, 8149, 8150, 8151, 8152,
8153, 8154, 8155, 8156, 8157, 8158, 8159, 8160, 8161, 8162, 8163,
8164, 8165, 8166, 8167, 8168, 8169, 8170, 8171, 8172, 8173, 8174,
8175, 8176, 8177, 8178, 8179, 8180, 8181, 8182, 8183, 8184, 8185,
8186, 8187, 8188, 8189, 8190, 8191, 8192, 8193, 8194, 8195, 12174,
12175, 12176, 12177, 12178, 12179, 12180, 12181, 12182, 12183,
12184, 12185, 12186, 12187, 12188, 12189, 12190, 12191, 12192,
12193, 12194, 12195, 12196, 12197, 12198, 12199, 12200, 12201,
12202, 12203, 12204, 12205, 12206, 12207, 12208, 12209, 12210,
12211, 12212, 12213, 12214, 12215, 12216, 12217, 12218, 12219,
12220, 12221, 12222, 12223};

Then use this code:

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("hero")) { c.getPA().clearQuestInterface(); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@red@Dear Hero", 8144); c.flushOutStream(); c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8146); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@red@Hi hero, im writing this for you to read this very moment.", 8147); c.getPA().sendFrame126("Me and the enslaved heros have made it out", 8148); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@red@sucessfully, yet, you were hit in the head with ", 8149); c.getPA().sendFrame126("mace and were knocked out. I quickly killed the gaurd,", 8150); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@red@though he set a curse on you. For I couldn't carry you. ", 8151); c.getPA().sendFrame126("You weighed as though you were a million bricks. Iv'e", 8152); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@red@seen this curse before, you are the only one who can", 8153); c.getPA().sendFrame126("withstand the weight, you must get to your feet, and", 8154); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@red@get out of that slave encampment, for more enemies", 8155); c.getPA().sendFrame126("are coming. I left some tools in your bag because I knew", 8156); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@red@it would be able to help you. Find your way outside, for", 8157); c.getPA().sendFrame126("I summoned a portal only heros can walk through.", 8158); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@red@You will be teleported back to camp and be safe.", 8159); c.getPA().sendFrame126("Once you get to camp, you can either PvP and skill away", 8160); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@red@or help us defeat the bad guys. Both choices will be", 8161); c.getPA().sendFrame126("you will be able to do at any given time you'd like.", 8162); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@red@For we are always here for you. HURRY TO THE PORTAL", 8163); c.getPA().showInterface(8134); [/quote]

mmk, thanks bud, i was going to ask u via pm, but u blocked me

Read full topic

item.title: Still need text help [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Acrodox Acrodox
item.description:
@Acrodox wrote:

can someone help me out? i never got my original problem fixed. anyways

my original problems here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,465855

and heres my code:

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("hero")) { c.getPA().sendFrame126("@red@Dear Hero", 8144); c.flushOutStream(); c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8146); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@red@Hi hero, im writing this for you to read this very moment.", 8147); c.getPA().sendFrame126("Me and the enslaved heros have made it out", 8148); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@red@sucessfully, yet, you were hit in the head with ", 8149); c.getPA().sendFrame126("mace and were knocked out. I left some tools in your bag because I knew", 8156); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@red@it would be able to help you. Both choices will be", 8161); c.getPA().sendFrame126("you will be able to do at any given time you'd like.", 8162); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@red@For we are always here for you.
